page.title: 20From the Data Counters
page.content:
About one third of our area is occupied by the RMA and Staff College, and so contains nothing to count (according to the guard commander). We couldn't get in ourselves.
Because there is so much new housing there are no accurate maps and we scrounged from every site office and estate agent we found. In the Eastern section most of the houses are huge, even the new ones. As we moved Westward the houses became smaller but nearly all detached. It looks as though we don't have many churches or schools but there are hordes of them 100 metres over the border of the surrounding blocks.
Collected by a large team of over 60 Data rechecked and sites revisited by Iain, Nicki and Sam
